title: Added Molten Core mapping and speedrun support

changes.change: Enemies assigned to a patrol now assume the same border color as the patrol color, instead of always being blue.

Many spells from enemies are no longer "duplicated" when viewing them on the map. Some spells require multiple spells to work, and they were all picked up and added to enemies. I've gone through it all and hid all the duplicates to the best of my abilities.
Attached more spells to NPCs based on received combat logs.

Exploring a dungeon no longer activates all non-seasonal affixes for display (such as Inspiring), it now looks at the most relevant affixes based on the last known season to determine which affixes to show info for.
Fixed some NPC spells not loading properly.
